dataIdInfo.idPurp: This toolset contains several tools to calculate various attributes for each bathymetric high or low feature. These attributes can be used to describe the characteristics of each feature. They can also be used to classify or assign each feature into a feature type based on a morphometric classification scheme.
dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The toolset contains the following six tools. Please see the detailed metadata associated with each tool.

  1. Add Shape Attributes High Tool: This tool generates shape attributes for each bathymetric high feature.

  2. Add Shape Attributes Low Tool: This tool generates shape attributes for each bathymetric low feature.

  3. Add Topographic Attributes High Tool: This tool generates topographic attributes for each bathymtric high feature.

  4. Add Topographic Attributes Low Tool: This tool generates topographic attributes for each bathymtric low feature.

  5. Add Profile Attributes High Tool: This tool generates profile attributes for each bathymetric high feature.

  6. Add Profile Attributes Low Tool: This tool generates profile attributes for each bathymetric low feature.

searchKeys.keyword: This toolset contains several tools to calculate various attributes for each bathymetric high or low feature.
